Dude, you don't have to be online to save playing a Game for Windows Live game. You can either create a dummy offline profile or you can use an official Xbox Live account, play offline while signed onto that account, and the game will still save fine. You need no Internet connection at all. Most people already understand this fact. Just like a with 360. You don't have to be online to use your account.

I have confirmed this game does work and save without an internet connection, although achievements are impossible to obtain, but the achievement system for this game is junk anyway. You must use the startup.exe file in order to launch the game and not the desktop shortcut that the installer creates for you. The startup file can be a real bitch to get installed though, due to extreme false positive issues. My anti-virus program treats that particular file far more aggressively then most false positives. The best part is that this game launches without having to alter the date on your computer. Most versions you'll find of this game require you to change the date on your computer in order to play it. Not an issue here.
